mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: On receipt of letter he notified Mr. Bacon to look out for Hubbard and apprise the patrols; infers he belongs to Mr. Randolph; his boat will soon start to Lynchburg; will carry 4 pairs of glass doors and semicircular windows; hopes Perry will come as soon as he arrives at Poplar Forest.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1811 May 10, Monticello [Albemarle County, Virginia] to Reuben Perry, n.p.
